body:
I've been busy playing this game ever since I turned inactive here so I thought of sharing it with you guys. So, just to summarise, RotMG stands for Realm of the Mad God and is an abbreviation used to do away with the whole game's spelling. I really hope you like it and if you do, add me on Skype so we can play together (juanomcplayer) (It's a multiplayer btw).

Here's a short intro for the game: https://www.realmeye.com/wiki/getting-started (Yeah, it has it's own forum as well).
And here's a vid showcasing the game: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MTnVu42fTZs

You can either play on your browser on or Steam though I'd suggest to play on Steam since gameplay is usually affected by using the browser.
